import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Row, Col, Input, Select, InputNumber, DatePicker, AutoComplete, Cascader, Divider, Form, Button } from 'antd' const { Option } = Select; const initialState = { type:'', category:'種類', amount:0, date:'' } const FormOpt = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = e =>{ console.log(e) } console.log(formData) return (
) } export default FormOpt
